arcs.headline: Next-gen video and image models have arrived
arcs.summary: We've integrated LTX-2 for high-quality video with audio, alongside Google's Imagen 3 and Grok Imagine Video. These additions significantly expand the creative toolkit available to all users.

arcs.headline: Smarter Claude and reliable Mistral
arcs.summary: The 'claude-large' alias now points to the newly released Opus 4.6, delivering better reasoning at no extra cost. We also migrated Mistral to OVHcloud and fixed configuration issues to ensure rock-solid stability.

arcs.headline: Zero queues and sustainable infrastructure
arcs.summary: Optimizations to the Z-Image pipeline have dropped generation queues to near zero. We also transitioned select high-cost models to supporter tiers to ensure long-term platform sustainability.

one_liner: A massive creative update featuring LTX-2 and Imagen 3, zero-queue speeds, and a Claude Opus upgrade.
